price: “Kun waan dachii irratti haqaan ala gammadaa turtaniifi waan daangaa dabroo taataniifi”
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bimā kuntum tafraḥūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi wabimā kuntum tamraḥūna
